confidence_notes: No scene data provided for analysis
Cannot assess VFX requirements without scene breakdowns
This appears to be a placeholder or incomplete script submission
Assessment is speculative and should not be used for budgeting

top_risk_themes: Insufficient data to assess VFX requirements
No scene context for vendor scoping
Cannot identify technical dependencies or workflows

hidden_cost_radar.why_it_matters: Without scene breakdowns, no meaningful VFX assessment can be performed. This creates total budget uncertainty and prevents vendor conversations, crew planning, or technical prep.
mitigation_ideas: Resubmit with complete script or scene breakdowns
If this is a treatment/pitch deck, clarify the nature of the document
Provide at least high-level shot list or visual references
Schedule script analysis session once material is available

hidden_cost_radar.why_it_matters: Single-page documents rarely contain sufficient detail for VFX planning. May indicate technical issues with script parsing or document format problems.
mitigation_ideas: Verify script file format and completeness
Check if document is a cover page rather than full script
Confirm scene headings follow standard screenplay format
Review export settings if converted from writing software

for_producer: Is this the complete script or a partial submission?
What is the actual page count and format of the source material?
Do we have scene breakdowns or shot lists available elsewhere?
What stage of development is this project in?
Should we wait for a revised script before VFX assessment?
for_vfx_supervisor: Can you provide visual references or concept art for expected VFX work?
Are there any known VFX sequences planned that aren't in this document?
What is the target VFX complexity/budget tier for this project?
Should we schedule a creative meeting to outline VFX intentions?
for_dp_camera: Are there any technical camera requirements we should know about?
Will this project require greenscreen, motion control, or specialized rigs?
What is the target delivery format and resolution?
for_locations_art_dept: Are there set extensions or environment VFX anticipated?
Will practical builds require VFX integration planning?
Do locations need to support tracking markers or LED volumes?
